name: Sol Invictus
description:
A guitar hero like game where you create a pattern to a beat. Your opponent (a local player on the same keyboard) has to follow the pattern you set. Then it switches the beat flow. And now you have to follow the pattern your opponent plays. 

The game is for 2 local players on the same keyboard. Player on the left uses WASD keys to play. Player to the right uses the arrow keys to play.
